title: Deposition of Dr. Emily V. Hartford
content:
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT FOR CLARK COUNTY, NEVADA

Plaintiffs: John A. Maxwell and Jane E. Maxwell
Defendant: Harrison Automotive, LLC
CASE NUMBER: CR29-05874

COPY DATE: September 15, 2023

## DEPOSITION
Pursuant to notice, the following videotaped deposition of DR. EMILY V. HARTFORD was taken before me, Susan T. Clarke, Notary Public, in and for the State of Nevada, at 221 Sunrise Valley Road, Suite 320, Henderson, Nevada 89014, commencing at 10:00 a.m., when present on behalf of the respective parties:

### APPEARANCES
- DAVID K. RYAN, ESQUIRE (Plaintiffs)
- MONICA L. TRAN, ESQUIRE (Defendant - Harrison Automotive, LLC)
- ALSO PRESENT: Alex Rivera, Video Operator

### INDEX
#### WITNESS
- DR. EMILY V. HARTFORD
  - Voir Dire Examination by Ms. Tran: Page 5
  - Direct Examination by Ms. Tran: Page 10
  - Cross Examination by Mr. Ryan: Page 22
  - Redirect Examination by Ms. Tran: Page 40

### EXHIBITS
- No. 1: Curriculum Vitae - Page 3
- No. 2: Police Reports - Page 8
- No. 3: Repair Invoices - Page 25 (Retained by Counsel)

EXAMINATION OF DR. EMILY V. HARTFORD
Dr. Emily V. Hartford was called as a witness by counsel for the Defendant, Harrison Automotive, LLC, and after having been duly sworn by the Notary Reporter, was examined and testified as follows:

### CERTIFICATION
I hereby certify that I, Susan T. Clarke, am a Notary Public in and for the State of Nevada, and that the foregoing is a true and accurate transcription of the deposition of Dr. Emily V. Hartford, taken at the above-stated time and place.

Susan T. Clarke, Notary Public
My Commission Expires: March 30, 2025

END OF TRANSCRIPT
source: Superior Court for Clark County, Nevada
